maintitle.big2: content in other languages, without learning them

questions.question: But the Internet already offers the services of professional translators, right?
questions.answer: We're professionals too. The difference is that we are affordable and do not specialize in bureaucratic processes.

questions.question: Why should I trust Dizce, when there are already online translators and dictionaries?
questions.answer: Because Dizce is not a translator, but a team of people which will guide you and later prepare a personalized product. Besides, such tools are full of inaccuracies.

focus.name: Families
focus.text: We offer and recommend academic materials for family learning; both free and paid:
points: Exclusive content from other languages, translated into English.
Translation of audiovisual, didactic (games, programs) or textual content, upon request.

focus.name: Businesses
focus.text: We help you expand your business beyond your borders, without having to worry about the language:
points: Consulting in the introduction of products to different markets in other continents.
100% accurate data collection and translation with respect to foreign markets
Complete translation of corporate websites or online stores.

focus.name: Individuals
focus.text: If you are curious and in search of knowledge, then we have options for you too:
points: Index with free course portals from the world's leading universities.
Free education offers in our search system.

focus.name: Personalization
focus.text: If you do not identify with any of the other options, or on the contrary you identify with several, then we offer you:
points: Write to us and we will gladly assist you with any requirements you may have. We are sure that we will find a way to help you, and if in spite of that we do not find it, then we will put you in contact with the ideal people or companies

furthermore: Our objective is to eliminate the language barriers that prevent you from obtaining better quality information, training and education; as well as your personal or business expansion.
But 'academic' education is not the only one and therefore we are convinced that the understanding of other cultures is equally, if not more important to develop.
We don't care about your age or your condition, just your desire to be better than yesterday.
